doc.after: The worship place is commonly known as Temple Usually regarded as Devasthana God s place or Mandir by the followers construction of temple and mode of worship is governed by several agama scriptures which deal with individual deities There are substantial differences in architecture customs rituals and traditions in temples in different parts of India 219
